Class CheckerboardWall

java.lang.Object
com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.wall.Wall
com.game.comp2042_cw_hcyot1.wall.CheckerboardWall
public class CheckerboardWall extends Wall
An implementation of class Wall where Brick of 2 types are used together to create a checkerboard effect.
